name: Kuwagamon
description: The first major boss encounter. A large insect Digimon with powerful pincers.

skills.name: Scissor Arms
skills.description: Powerful pincer attack that deals heavy damage to a single target

skills.name: Power Guillotine
skills.description: Ultimate pincer attack with chance to critical hit

strategy: Focus on Vaccine-type Digimon with fire attacks. Keep your HP above 50% as Kuwagamon can deal heavy burst damage with Power Guillotine. Use healing items between attacks.

phases.behavior: Uses Scissor Arms frequently. Moderate damage output.
phases.strategy: Deal consistent damage while maintaining HP above 60%

phases.behavior: Becomes aggressive. Uses Power Guillotine more often.
phases.strategy: Prioritize defense and healing. Save your strongest attacks for when it's below 30% HP

name: Devimon
description: A fallen angel Digimon that commands darkness. First Champion-level boss encounter.

skills.name: Death Claw
skills.description: Razor-sharp claws attack with dark energy

skills.name: Evil Wing
skills.description: Dark energy projectiles that hit all party members

skills.name: Touch of Evil
skills.description: Chance to inflict Confusion on one target

strategy: Bring multiple Vaccine-type Digimon. Devimon's Evil Wing hits the entire party, so keep everyone's HP up. Have Antidote items ready for Confusion status.

phases.behavior: Alternates between Death Claw and Evil Wing
phases.strategy: Focus on dealing damage while healing after Evil Wing attacks

phases.behavior: Uses Touch of Evil to disrupt your team
phases.strategy: Prioritize curing Confusion immediately. Confused allies can attack their own team

phases.behavior: Desperate mode - uses Evil Wing more frequently
phases.strategy: Keep all party members above 40% HP. Use your strongest attacks to finish quickly

name: Etemon
description: The self-proclaimed king of Digimon. Uses music-based attacks and has high defense.

skills.name: Dark Spirits
skills.description: Dark energy attack hitting random targets

skills.name: Monkey Kick
skills.description: Powerful physical attack with high accuracy

skills.name: Concert Crush
skills.description: Ultimate sound wave attack hitting all enemies. Used when HP is low

strategy: Etemon has very high defense, making physical attacks less effective. Use special attacks, especially Water and Ice types. His Concert Crush is devastating - try to finish him before he can use it multiple times.

phases.behavior: Uses Dark Spirits and Monkey Kick alternately
phases.strategy: Focus on special attacks to bypass his high defense

phases.behavior: Starts using Concert Crush. Very dangerous phase
phases.strategy: Maximize damage output. Keep HP above 60% to survive Concert Crush. Consider using defensive buffs

name: Myotismon
description: A vampire Digimon that rules the night. Can drain HP and inflict multiple status effects.

skills.name: Crimson Lightning
skills.description: Powerful dark lightning attack

skills.name: Nightmare Claw
skills.description: Drains HP from target and heals Myotismon

skills.name: Grizzly Wing
skills.description: Summons bats that can inflict Sleep status

skills.name: Nightmare Wave
skills.description: Ultimate dark attack used when HP is critical

strategy: This is a challenging boss. Myotismon can heal himself with Nightmare Claw, making the battle longer. Bring awakening items for Sleep status. Light-type attacks are extremely effective - prioritize Digimon with holy attributes.

phases.behavior: Cycles through Crimson Lightning and Nightmare Claw
phases.strategy: Deal consistent damage. Healing is important as Nightmare Claw can swing momentum

phases.behavior: Adds Grizzly Wing to rotation. May put multiple allies to sleep
phases.strategy: Wake up sleeping allies immediately. Focus fire to reduce his healing opportunities

phases.behavior: Desperate attacks. Uses Nightmare Wave and Nightmare Claw more frequently
phases.strategy: Maintain HP above 50%. Use your strongest Light attacks. Consider defensive items before Nightmare Wave

name: Piedmon
description: A master of dark magic and illusions. One of the Dark Masters with devastating magical attacks.

skills.name: Trump Sword
skills.description: Throws magical swords that pierce through defenses

skills.name: Ending Snipe
skills.description: Precise magic attack with guaranteed critical hit

skills.name: Clown Trick
skills.description: Transforms one Digimon into a keychain, removing them from battle temporarily

skills.name: Masks Square
skills.description: Ultimate magic attack hitting all enemies. Used when critical

strategy: Piedmon is a magic powerhouse. His Clown Trick can remove your strongest Digimon from battle - spread your damage dealers across your team. High INT defense is crucial. Light and Holy attacks are your best bet.

phases.behavior: Uses Trump Sword and Ending Snipe frequently
phases.strategy: Deal steady damage. Keep INT defense buffed if possible

phases.behavior: Starts using Clown Trick to disable your strongest Digimon
phases.strategy: Don't rely on one damage dealer. Have backup attackers ready. Disabled Digimon return after 2-3 turns

phases.behavior: Aggressive magic spam. Uses Masks Square repeatedly
phases.strategy: Maximum damage output phase. Keep everyone above 50% HP. Use items liberally. Finish quickly

name: Machinedramon
description: A mechanical dragon with overwhelming firepower. Another Dark Master with extreme defense.

skills.name: Giga Cannon
skills.description: Massive energy cannon that deals heavy damage

skills.name: Dragon Fire
skills.description: Flame breath attack hitting multiple targets

skills.name: Infinity Hand
skills.description: Mechanical arms attack with high accuracy, hits twice

skills.name: Catastrophe Blast
skills.description: Ultimate weapon discharge. Devastating AoE attack

strategy: Machinedramon has extremely high attack and defense. Water and Thunder attacks are essential. His Catastrophe Blast can wipe your team - keep HP topped off. Physical attacks are heavily resisted, use special moves.

phases.behavior: Rotates between Giga Cannon, Dragon Fire, and Infinity Hand
phases.strategy: Focus on Water/Thunder special attacks. Maintain high HP at all times

phases.behavior: Catastrophe Blast becomes available. Extremely dangerous
phases.strategy: All party members need 70%+ HP. Use defensive buffs before Catastrophe Blast. Burst damage when possible

name: Apocalymon
description: The final boss. An entity of pure chaos born from deleted data. Has multiple forms and devastating attacks.

skills.name: Grand Death Big Bang
skills.description: Massive explosion of chaos energy

skills.name: Total Annihilation
skills.description: Attempts to delete all targets from existence

skills.name: Darkness Zone
skills.description: Creates zone that reduces all stats by 30%

skills.name: Ultimate Stream
skills.description: Energy stream that hits random targets multiple times

strategy: The ultimate challenge. Apocalymon has no true weaknesses. Bring your strongest Mega-level Digimon with diverse attack types. Stock up on revival items and mega recovery. The battle has multiple phases - pace yourself and maintain resources.

phases.behavior: Testing phase. Uses Ultimate Stream and Total Annihilation
phases.strategy: Learn attack patterns. Deal steady damage while conserving items

phases.behavior: Creates Darkness Zone. All your stats reduced significantly
phases.strategy: Use stat-boosting items to counteract debuff. Focus fire continues

phases.behavior: Begins using Grand Death Big Bang. Extreme damage phase
phases.strategy: Keep ALL party members above 60% HP minimum. Heal before and after Big Bang

phases.behavior: Desperate final stand. Spams strongest attacks
phases.strategy: All-out assault. Use your strongest attacks and ultimate moves. Be prepared to revive fallen allies. Victory is close!
